quote.msg:
KPMG can hardly be considered as big4

Disclaimer: ex-KP

replies.msg:
Based on quality and client base. Their core strength was FS audit, that had been overtaken by PwC and EY, almost all the major foreign banks have switched auditors.

Their advisory practice is a complete joke in HK.

If you want to get a career outside of Big4, KPMG is a pretty poor choice as a stepping stone

Work = experience, usually it's those who are worked to the bone that are more employable when they leave. I had insane working hours, but that translated to me having one of the best exits opportunity out of all my peers.

Also, KP hires everybody because nobody wants to work for them.
